Hello, I'm Lmarl. I'm a programmer with 2 years of experience. I enjoy building coding and fixing bugs. My focus is Java (Spring) and SQL.

About me

After graduating with a degree in Information Technology, I landed in different jobs to fulfill my passion in programming. My favorite part of programming is the problem-solving aspect. I love the feeling of finally figuring out a solution to a problem. My core stack is React, Java (Spring), and Mysql. I am also familiar with TypeScript, Angular, and PHP. I am always looking to learn new technologies.

When I'm not coding, I enjoy playing video games, playing organ, and motor travelling. I also enjoy learning new things. I am currently learning about life hacks and public speaking. I'm also learning how to play the piano.
